title: Discovery of a novel mutation F184S (c.551T>C) in GATA4 gene causing congenital heart disease in a consanguineous Saudi family
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Mahmood Rasool, Peter Natesan Pushparaj, Absarul Haque, Ayat Mohammed Shorbaji, Loubna Siraj Mira, Sherin Bakhashab, Mohamed Nabil Alama, Muhammad Farooq, Sajjad Karim, Lars Allan Larsen
